input.sentences: the empty auditorium awaits the new graduates .
the seats slowly begin to fill with graduates .
family members are happy to attend the graduation .
towards the end of the ceremony | the graduates rise out of their seats .
the new graduates prepare to leave the auditorium .
output.sentences: It was graduation day, and everyone awaited the start of the ceremony.
Slowly, the audience took their seats.
Grandma and grandpa were so happy to be there.
The graduates were excited to get to their seats.
When the ceremony was over, everyone prepared to leave.
